msContents.summary: Hālāsyamāhātmya is part of the Skandapurāṇa. It contains the story about Viśvanātha śiva. The available edition of this text is with the Mīnākṣistuti. Front cover has a line written in Telugu script. Second folio after the guard folio is damaged. Last folio unnumbered.

msItem.title: Hālāsyamāhātmya
msItem.rubric:
śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye || vāgarthāviva saṃpṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye | jagatapi
tarau vande pārvatiparameśvarau ||
msItem.incipit:
mātāmahamahāśailaṃ mahastapitāhaṃ kāraṇanjagatāṃ vande kaduparihāraṇaṃ || kāruṇyamadaniṣyandaṃ kaivalya
vanacāriṇaṃ | kālāṃbudaśyāmalāṅgaṃ kalabhānanamāśraye || āmnāyacalamañcasthamānaneṣaḍbhiranvitaṃ | himādristanayāstanyakukṣiṃ bharimu
msItem.explicit:
tu sarvasya bhavatātcchivaṃ | iti saṃprārthya sarvajñassūtassarvamuniśvarān | kṛpādṛṣṭyānugṛhyātha śivadhyānaparo bhavat ||
iti śrīskānde purāṇe agastyasaṃhitāyāṃ hālāsyamāhātyme agastyavasiṣṭhādyanantamunivarairānandavanāt ||
msItem.finalRubric:
psitaṃ | kṣetraṃ hi hālāsyamidaṃ pavitraṃ gātraṃ vahantyate vatā gātraṃ | gātraṃ yadi syātadayunmanetraṃ gotrānmajāko magātra
miśraṃ | namostu tasmai madhurānagadhyai hemābjīni sat sarasyai |
namostu devyai śaparekṣaṇāyai namo
stu saukhyāśvaralīṅgamuktyai || hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu mīnākṣīsahāyaṃ
karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ ||
